meanings.definition: Make minor changes in order to improve or correct
meanings.sent1: I will amend the spelling mistake in my essay.
meanings.sent2: She decided to amend her outfit by adding a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to amend the recipe after realizing he forgot an ingredient.
meanings.sent4: He amended his behavior after receiving feedback from his boss.
meanings.sent5: The student amended his answer on the test to make it more accurate.
